text: Herbert Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr. (; August 22, 1934 - December 27, 2012), better known as Norman Schwarzkopf, Jr., was a United States Army general who was the commander of the U.S. Central Command and the coalition forces in the Gulf War. He was born in Trenton, New Jersey, the son of Ruth Alice (n√©e Bowman) and Norman Schwarzkopf, Sr., both Americans of German origin. Schwarzkopf died from pneumonia on December 27, 2012, aged 78, in Tampa, Florida. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American generals Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Florida Category:People from Trenton, New Jersey Category:Republicans (United States) Category:Military people from New Jersey
title: Norman Schwarzkopf Jr.
